mcwifipnp.gui.port.small: Input port number is too small
mcwifipnp.gui.port.large: Input port number is too large
mcwifipnp.gui.motd.info: The message to display in server list
mcwifipnp.gui.OnlineMode.info: Allow offline players to join aswell
mcwifipnp.gui.EnablePvP.info: Allows player to battle each other
mcwifipnp.upnp.success.clipboard: Successfully got public %s, Due to factors such as NAT, these IPs may still not be able to connect directly.
mcwifipnp.upnp.success.cantgetip: Couldn't get public IP! Your IPv4 may contain multiple NATs or you do not have IPv6.
mcwifipnp.upnp.failed.mapped: Unable to forward port %s: Port was already mapped by another UPnP service, Please change the port number.
mcwifipnp.upnp.failed.disabled: Unable to forward port %s: UPnP is not enabled on your router, You may need to use port mapping software.
mcwifipnp.upnp.failed.unknownerror: Unable to forward port %s: Unknown error while adding port mapping, Please use a port mapping software.
